How To Upgrade the InVision Instance

Link to the video

Under this link you will find video that shows how to Upgrade the InVision Instance. Here you will find Documentation.

Step by step

  1. Choose one of the upgrade options in Installation Manager:

  1. Select version which you want to upgrade:

  1. Select instance:

  1. Download Desktop Designer Installer, and install upgraded version:
